error.message: Call to deprecated function system_list(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('theme_handler')->listInfo() instead.
Class Drupal\tour_block\Tests\TourBlockControllerTest was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to tour_block.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
